about.title: About Cow-Boys Collab
about.description: cow-boys collab is a two-person art team focused on visual storytelling through murals, upcycled clothing, and hand-crafted prints. We draw inspiration from the textures of everyday life and create work with a sketchy, expressive style that celebrates imperfection and character. Our goal is to make art that feels alive, approachable, and emotionally engaging.
